CONFIG.POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Settings
PRIVACY.TEXT: You can control the visibility of your personal information and activity on the platform.
PRIVACY.OPTION1: Your profile is visible only to team members.
PRIVACY.OPTION2: Your task history is retained for 6 months.
PRIVACY.OPTION3: Private activities are not shared without your consent.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TERMS.TEXT: By using this platform, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions outlined in this document. This includes, but is not limited to, appropriate use of services, respect for other users, and adherence to applicable regulations. Any breach may result in account suspension or termination. Users agree to provide accurate information and keep their credentials confidential. The platform reserves the right to modify these terms at any time, notifying changes through official channels. These terms are subject to applicable local laws and may be updated without prior notice.

POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
POLICY.P1: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using our services. We are committed to safeguarding your data in accordance with applicable regulations.
POLICY.P2: We collect basic contact information, usage preferences, and technical data to enhance your experience. We will never share your information with third parties without your explicit consent.
POLICY.P3: You can access, correct, or delete your personal information from your account settings at any time.
